name: ExPerium
description:
ExPerium

You are Gloria, together with your companion, Hope, you will solve puzzles. Gloria sees the world as a cheery happy place, the world reflects this mindset.

On your journey you will meet Separatam who does not see the world quite as cheery as Gloria does. Separatam will often lose control over Hope, who will hinder your progress in your adventure.

Gloria and Separatam are the same entity. Separatam represents the, often viewed as, the darker more negative side of the brain.

Controls

WASD to move.
MOUSE to move your companion.

Feedback is greatly appreciated!
